text:
In the default publication, edit tutorial. Save, edit, save, edit, save. You'll
see that there are more and more blank paragraphs being added. A guess as to the
cause is the pretty-printing module.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
ragaller@apache.org
text:
I cannot reproduce this on my setup.

TinyMCE 2.1.3, Firefox 2.0.0.11, osx 10.5.1

TinyMCE 2.1.1.1, Firefox 2.0.0.11, Linux, trunk. I'll try updating my TinyMCE
later today to see if it was fixed there.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
